GSP33brssbh3u:2691: darśayati ca śrutiradhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca tattvābhedam - 'agnirvāgbhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśat' (ai. 2.4)
GSP33brssbh3u:2693: tathā 'ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarvo 'nantāḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.13)
GSP33brssbh3u:2695: tathānyatrāpi tatra tatrādhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca bahudhā tattvabhedadarśanaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2696: kvacicca 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ iti spaṣṭameva vāyuṃ prāṇaṃ caikaṃ karoti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2702: tathā chāndogye 'pi parastāt 'mahātmanaścaturo deva ekaḥ kaḥ sa jāgara bhuvanasya gopāḥ' (chā. 4.3.6)
GSP33brssbh3u:2703: ityekameva saṃvargaṃ gamayati na bravītyeka ekeṣāṃ caturṇāṃ saṃvargo 'paro 'pareṣāmiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2713: 'sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇa evametāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyuḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.22)
GSP33brssbh3u:2718: bhagnavratāni hi vāgādīnyuktāni 'tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2722: iti cektvā 'teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati (bṛ. 1.5.23)
GSP33brssbh3u:2726: tathā 'tau vā etau dvau saṃvargau vāyureva deveṣu prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu' (chā. 4.3.4)
GSP33brssbh3u:2727: iti bhedena vyapadiśati 'te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santastatkṛtam' (chā. 4.3.8)
GSP33brssbh3u:2732: ato vacanādindrābhedācca sahapradānāśaṅkāyāṃ rājādiguṇabhedādyājyānuvākyavyatyāsavidhānācca yathānyasameva devatāpṛthaktvātpradānapṛthaktvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2734: taduktaṃ saṃkarṣe 'nānā vā devatā pṛthagjñānāt' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2735: tatra tu dravyadevatābhedādyāgabhedo vidyate naivamiha vidyābhedo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2737: vidyaikasthe 'pi tvadhyātmādhidaivabhedātpravṛttibhedo bhavati agnihotra iva sāyaṃprātaḥkālabhedāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2742: vājasaneyino 'gnirahasye - 'naiva idamagre sadāsīt' ityetasminbrāhmaṇe mano 'dhikṛtyādhīyate 'tatṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇyapaśyadātmano 'gnīnarkānmanomayāmanaścitaḥ' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2743: tathaiva 'vākcitaḥ prāṇacitaścakṣuścitaḥ śrotracitaḥ karmacito 'gnicitaḥ' iti pṛthagagamanīnāmananti sāṃpādikān /
GSP33brssbh3u:2744: teṣu saṃśayaḥ - kimete manaścidādayaḥ kriyānupraveśinastaccheṣabhūtā uta svatantrāḥ kevalavidyātmakā iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2745: tatra prakaraṇākriyānupraveśe prāpte svātantryaṃ tāvatpratijānīte liṅgabhayastvāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2746: bhūyāṃsi hiliṅgānyasminbrāhmaṇe kevalavidyātmakatvameṣāmupodbalayanti dṛśyante tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ iti,
GSP33brssbh3u:2747: 'tānhaitānevaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate' iti caivañjātīyakāni /
GSP33brssbh3u:2753: pūrvasya kriyāmayasyāgneḥ prakaraṇāttadviṣaya evāyaṃ vikalpaviśeṣopadeśaḥ syānna svatantraḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2759: anyārthadarśanaṃ cāsatyāmanyasyāṃ prāptau guṇavādenāpyupapadyamānaṃ na prakaraṇaṃ bādhitumutsahate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2762: yathā daśarātrasya dasaṇe 'hanyavivākye pṛthivyā pātreṇa samudrasya somasya prajāpataye devatāyai guhyamāṇasya grahaṇāsādanahavanāharaṇopahvānabhakṣaṇāni mānasānyevāmnāyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:2763: sa ca mānaso 'pi grahakalpaḥ kriyāprakaraṇātkriyāśeṣa eva bhavatyevamayamapyagnikalpa ityarthaḥ // 45 //
GSP33brssbh3u:2774: vidyātmakā evaite svatantrā manaścidādayo 'gnayaḥ syurna kriyāśeṣabhūtāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2775: tathāhi nirdhārayati - 'te haite vidyācita eva' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2776: vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavanti iti ca // 47 //
GSP33brssbh3u:2781: nanu liṅgamapyasatyāṃmanyasyāṃ prāptāvasādhakaṃ kasyacidarthasyetyapāsya tatprakaraṇasāmarthyātkriyāśeṣatvamadhyavasitamityata uttaraṃ paṭhati -
GSP33brssbh3u:2790: tathā liṅm 'sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2792: 'vidyācita eva' iti hi sāvadhāraṇeyaṃ śrutiḥ kriyānupraveśe 'mīṣāmabhyupagamyamāne pīḍitā syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2795: tadabhiprāyatāyāṃ hividyocita itīyatā svarūpasamakīrtanenaiva kṛtatvādanarthakamavadhāraṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh3u:2798: tathā 'svapate jāgrate caivaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtānyetānyetānagniṃścinvanti' iti sātatyadarśanameṣāṃ svātantrye 'vakalpate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2799: yathā sāṃpādike vākyaprāṇamaye 'gnihotre 'prāṇaṃ tadā vāci juhoti - vācaṃ tadā prāṇe juhoti' (kau. 2.5)
GSP33brssbh3u:2800: iti coktvocyate - 'ete anante āhutī jāgracca svapaṃśca satataṃ - juhoti' (kauṣī. 2.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2802: kriyānupraveśe tu kriyāprayogasyālpakālatvena na sātatyeṣāṃ prayogaḥ kalpeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:2804: yatra hi vispaṣṭo vidhāyako liṅgādirupalabhyate yuktaṃ tatra saṃkīrtanamātrasyārthavādatvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2805: iha hi vispaṣṭovidhyantarānupalabdheḥ saṃkīrtanādevaiṣāṃ vijñānavidhānaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2806: tacca yathāsaṃkīrtanameva kalpayituṃ śakyata iti sātatyadarśanāttathābhūtameva kalpyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2808: etena tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ ityādi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2809: tathā vākyamapi evaṃvide iti puruṣaviśeṣasaṃbandhamevaiṣāmācakṣaṇaṃ na kratusaṃbandhaṃ mṛṣyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2814_1: grahā agṛhyanta manasāstuvanmanasāśaṃsanyatkiñca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiñca yajñiyaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:2814_2: karma manasaiva teṣu tanmanomayeṣu manaścitsu manomayameva kriyate' ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh3u:2816: naca pratyakṣāḥ kriyāvayavāḥ santaḥ saṃpadā lipsitavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2818: nahyatra kriyāṅgaṃ kiñcidādāya tasminnado nāmādhyavasitavyamiti vadati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2819: ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇi tu manovṛttibhedānādāya teṣvagnitvaṃ grahādīṃśca kalpayati puruṣayādivat /
GSP33brssbh3u:2820: saṃkhyā ceyaṃ puruṣāyuṣasyāhaḥsu dṛṣṭā satī tatsaṃbandhinīṣu manovṛttiṣvāropyata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2823: tathāhi - 'teṣāmekaika eva tāvānyānānasau pūrvaḥ' iti kriyāmayasyāgnermāhātmyaṃ jñānamayānāmekaikasyātidiśankiriyāyāmanādaraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2824: naca satyeva kriyāsaṃbandhe vikalpaḥ pūrveṇottareṣāmiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssbh3u:2825: nahi yena vyāpāreṇāhanīyadhāraṇādinā pūrvaḥ kriyāyāmupakaroti tenottara upakartuṃ śaknuvanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2826: yattu pūrvapakṣe 'pyatideśa upodbalaka ityuktaṃ sati hi sāmānye 'tideśaḥ pravartata iti tadasmātpakṣe 'gnitvasāmānyenātideśasaṃbhavātpratyuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2831: yathā prajñāntarāṇi śāṇḍilyavidyāprabhṛtīni svena svenānubadhyamānāni pṛthageva karmabhyaḥ prajñāntarebhyaśca svatantrāṇi bhavantyevamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2833: taduktaṃ prathame kāṇḍe - 'kratvarthāyāmiti cenna varṇatrayasaṃyogāt' (jai.sū. 11.4.7) iti // 50 //
GSP33brssbh3u:2844: yathā 'sa vā eṣa eva mṛtyurya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ' iti 'agnirvai mṛtyuḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.10)
GSP33brssbh3u:2846: yathā ca 'asau vāva loko gautamāgnistasyāditya eva samit' (chā. 5.4.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2849: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāt tv anubandhaḥ / BBs_3,3.52 /
GSP33brssbh3u:2850: parastādapi 'ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo 'gniścittaḥ' ityasminnanantare brāhmaṇe tāvadvadhyaṃ kevalavidyāvidhitvaṃ śabdasya prayojanaṃ lakṣyate na śuddhakarmāṅgavidhitvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2851: tatra hi -' vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2852: na tatra dakṣīṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvinaḥ' ityanena ślokena kevalaṃ karmanindanvidhyāṃ ca praśaṃsannidaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2853_0: tathā purastādapi yadetanmaṇḍalaṃ tapati ityasminbrāhmaṇe vidyāpradhānatvameva lakṣyate
GSP33brssbh3u:2853_1: so 'mṛto bhavati mṛtyurhyasyātmā bhavati iti vidyāphalenaivopasaṃhārānna karmapradhānatā
GSP33brssbh3u:2854: bhūyāṃsastvagnyavayavāḥ saṃpādayitavyā vidyāyāmityetasmātkāraṇādagninānubadhyate vidyā na karmāṅgatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2860: nahyasati dehavyatiriktātmani paralokāścodanā upapajadyerankasya vā brahmātmatvamupadiśyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:2861: nanu śāstrapramukha eva prathame pāde śāstraphalopabhogyasya dehāvyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2863: iha tu svayameva sūtrakṛtā tadastitvamākṣepapuraḥsaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2864: ita eva cākṛṣyācāryeṇa śabarasvāminā pramāṇalakṣaṇe varṇitam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2865: ata eva ca bhagavatopavarṣeṇa prathame tantra ātmāstitvābhidhānaprasaktau śārīrake vakṣyamāḥ ityuddhāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2866: iha cedaṃ codanālakṣaṇeṣūpāsaneṣu vicāryamāṇeṣvātmāstitvaṃ vicāryate kṛtsnaśāstraśeṣatvapradarśanāya /
GSP33brssbh3u:2867_1: varṇitaṃ ko 'sau puruṣo yadarthā ete manaścidādaya ityasyāṃ prasaktāvidaṃ dehavyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamucyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2869: ākṣepapūrvikā hi parihāroktirvivakṣiter'the sthūṇānikhanananyāyena dṛḍhāṃ buddhimutpādayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2870_1: samastavyasteṣu bāhyeṣu pṛthivyādiṣvadṛṣṭamapi caitanyaṃ śarīrākārapariṇateṣu bhūteṣu
GSP33brssbh3u:2870_2: syāditi saṃbhāvayantastebhyaścaitanyaṃ madaśaktivadvijñānaṃ caitanyaviśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣa iti cāhuḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2871: na svargagamanāyāpavargagamanāya vā samartho dehavyatirikta ātmāsti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2873: yaddhi yasminsati bhavatyasati ca na bhavati tattaddharmatvenādhyavasīte yathāgnidharmāvauṣṇyaprakāśau /
GSP33brssbh3u:2874_1: upalabhyamānā bahiścānupalabhyamānā asiddhe dehavyatirikte dharmiṇi dehadharmā eva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2883: yadi dehabhāve bhāvāddehadharmatvamātmadharmāṇāṃ manyeta tato dehabhāve 'pyabhāvādataddharmatvamevaiṣāṃ kiṃ na manyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:2886: prāṇaceṣṭādayastu satyapi dehe mṛtāvasthāyāṃ na bavanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2888: apica sati hi tāvaddehe jīvadavasthāyāmeṣāṃ bhāvaḥ śakyate niścetuṃ natvasatyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2891: kimātmakaṃ ca punaridaṃ caitanyaṃ manyate yasya bhūtebhya utpattimicchatīti paraḥ paryanuyoktavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2894: tarhi viṣayatvātteṣāṃ na taddharmatvamaśnuvīta svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2897: nahi bhūtabhautikadharmeṇa satā caitanyena bhūtabhautikāni viṣayīkriyeran /
GSP33brssbh3u:2901: upalabdhisvarūpa eva ca na ātmetyātmano dehavyatiriktatvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2905: yattūktaṃ śarīre bhāvāccharīradharma upalabdairiti tadvarṇitena prakāreṇa pratyuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2908: evaṃ sati deha upalabdhirbhavatyasati ca na bhavatīti na dehadharmau bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2910: nacātyantaṃ dehasyopalabdhāvupayogo 'pi dṛśyate niśceṣṭe 'pyasmindehe svapne nānāvidhopalabdhidarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2914: aṅgāvabaddhāstu na śākhāsu hi prativedam / BBs_3,3.55 /
GSP33brssbh3u:2920_0: 'ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo 'gniścitaḥ' ityevamādyā ya udgīthādikarmāṅgāvabaddhāḥ pratyayāḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2924: iti hi sāmānyavihitānāṃ viśṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ saṃnikṛṣṭenaiva svaśākhāgatena viśeṣaṇākāṅkṣādinivṛtteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2932: svaśākhāvyavasthāyāṃ hyudgīthamupāsīteti sāmnyaśrutiraviśeṣapravṛttā satī saṃnidhānavaśena viśeṣe vyavasthāpyamānā pīḍitā syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2942: tathāhi mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ guṇānāṃ ca śākhāntarotpannānāmapi śākhāntara upasaṃgraho dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2943_0: yeṣāmapi hi śākhināṃ kuṭarurasītyaśmādānamantro nāmnātasteṣāmapyasau viniyogo dṛśyate
GSP33brssbh3u:2943_1: kukkuṭarasītyaśmādānamantro nāmnātasteṣāmapyasau viniyogo dṛśyate kukkuṭo 'sītyaśmādānamādatte kudarurasīti veti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2944: yeṣāmapi samidādayaḥ prayājaḍā nāmnātasteṣāmapi teṣu guṇavidhirāmnāyate - ṛtavo vai prayājāḥ samānatra hotavyāḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2945: tathā yeṣāmapi ajo 'gnīṣomīyaḥ iti jātiviśeṣopadeśo nāsti teṣāmapi tadviṣayo mantravarṇa upalabhyate - chāgasya vapāyā medaso 'nurbrūhi iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2946: tathā vedāntarotpannānāmapi 'agnerverhetraṃ veradhvaram' ityevamādimantrāṇāṃ vedāntare parigraho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2947: tathābahvṛcapaṭhitasya sūktasya yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān (ṛ.saṃ 2.6.7)
GSP33brssbh3u:2948: ityasya adhvaryave sajanīyaṃ śasyam ityatra parigraho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2952: bhūmnaḥ kratuvajjyāyastvaṃ tathā hi darśayati / BBs_3,3.57 /
GSP33brssbh3u:2954: ityasyāmākhyāyikāyāṃ vyastasya samastasya ca vaiśvānarasyopāsanaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2955: vyastopāsanaṃ tāvat 'aupamanyava kaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥsa iti devameva bhagavo rājanniti hovācaiṣa vai sutejā ātmā vaiśvānaro yaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥse' (chā. 5.12.1) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2956_0: tathā samastopāsanamapi 'tasya ha vā etasyātmano vaiśvānarasyamūrdhaiva sutejāścakṣurviśvarūpa
GSP33brssbh3u:2956_1: prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmātmā saṃdeho bahulo bastireva rayiḥ pṛthivyeva pādau' (chā. 5.18.2) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2957: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimihobhayathāpyupāsanaṃ syādvyastasya samastasya cota smastasyaiveti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2959: pratyavayavaṃ sutejaḥprabhṛtiṣūpāḥsa iti kriyāpadaśravaṇāt 'tasmāttava sutaṃ prasutamāsutaṃ kule dṛśyate' (chā. 5.12.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2961: tato 'bidhīyate - bhūnnaḥ padārthopacayātmakasya samastasya vaiśvānaropāsanasya jyāyastvaṃ prādhānyamasminvākye vivakṣitaṃ bhavitumarhati na pratyekamavayavopāsanānāmapi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2963: yathā kratuṣu darśapūrṇamāsāprabhṛtiṣu sāmastyena sāṅgapradhānaprayoga evaikovivakṣyate na vyastānāmapi prayogaḥ prayājādīnām /
GSP33brssbh3u:2968_0: tathāhi - prācīnaśālaprabhṛtaya uddālakāvasānāḥ ṣaḍṛṣayo vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ pariniṣṭhamapratipadyamānā
GSP33brssbh3u:2972: punaśca vyastopāsanaṃ vyāvartya samastopāsanamevānuvartya 'sa sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣvātmasvannamatti' (chā. 5.18.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2974: yattu pratyekaṃ sutejaḥprabhṛtiṣu phalabhedaśravaṇaṃ tadevaṃ satyaṅgaphalāni pradhāna evābhyupagatānīti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2975: tathopāḥsa ityapi pratyavayavamākhyātaśravaṇaṃ parābhiprāyānuvādārthaṃ na vyastopāsanavidhānārtham /
GSP33brssbh3u:2977: kecittvatra samastopāsanapakṣaṃ jyāyāṃsaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya jyāyastvavacanādeva kila vyastopāsanapakṣamapi sūtrakāro 'numanyata iti kathayanti tadayuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2981: spaṣṭo copāsaṃhārasthe samastopāsanāvagame tadabhāvasya pūrvapakṣe vaktumaśakyatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2986: pūrvasminnadhikaraṇe satyamapi sutejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ phalabhedaśrutau samastopāsanaṃ jyāya ityuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2987: ataḥ prāptā buddhiranyānyapi bhinnaśrutīnyupāsanāni samasyopāśiṣyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2988: apica naiva vedyābhede vidyābhedo vijñātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2989: vedyaṃ hi rūpaṃ vidyāyā dravyadaivatamiva yāgasya /
GSP33brssbh3u:2994: tathā eka eva prāṇaḥ prāṇo vāva saṃvargaḥ' (chā. 4.3.3)

GSP33brssbh3u:3419: yathā 'iyameva juhūrādityaḥ kūrmaḥ svargo loka āhavanīyaḥ' ityādyā juhvādistutyarthāstadvaditi cet /
GSP33brssbh3u:3422: vidhyarthatāyāṃ hyapūrvor'tho vihito bhavati stutyarthatāyāṃ tvānarthakyameva syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3423: vidhāyakasya hi śabdasya vākyaśeṣabhāvaṃ pratipadyamānā stutirupayujyata ityuktam 'vidhinā tvekavākyatvātstutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ ityatra /
GSP33brssbh3u:3431: 'ahamukthamasmīti vidyāt' ityādayaśca vispaṣṭā vidhiśabdāḥ śrūyante te ca stutimātraprayojanatāyāṃ vyāhanyeran /
GSP33brssbh3u:3432: tathāca nyāyavidāṃ smaraṇam -'kuryātkriyeta kartavyaṃ bhavetasyāditi pañcamam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3433: etatsyātsarvavedeṣu niyataṃ vidhilakṣaṇam' iti liṅgādyartho vidhiriti manyamānāsta evaṃ smaranti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3434: pratiprakaraṇaṃ ca phalāni śrāvyate - 'āpayitā ha vai kāmānāṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.7)
GSP33brssbh3u:3440: pāriplavārthā iti cen na viśeṣitatvāt / BBs_3,4.23 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3441: 'atha ha yājñavalkyasya dve bhārye babhūvaturmaitreyī ca kātyayanī ca' (bṛ. 4.5.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:3453: 'pāriplavamācakṣīta' iti hi prakṛtya 'manurvaivasvato rājā' ityevamādīni kānicidevākhyānāni tatra viśeṣyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:3458: asati ca pariplavārthatva ākhyānānāṃ saṃnihitavidyāpratipādanopayogitaiva nyāyyā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3465: yathā 'sa ātmāno vapāmudakhidat' ityevamādīnāṃ karmaśrutigatānāmākhyānāṃ saṃnihitavidhistutyarthatā tadvat /
GSP33brssbh3u:3472: ateva ca vidyāyāḥ puruṣārthahetutvādagnīndhanādīnyāśramakmāṇi vidyayā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣitavyānītyādyasyaivādhikaraṇasya phalamupasaṃharatyadhikavivakṣayā // 25 //
GSP33brssbh3u:3476: idamidānīṃ cintyate kiṃ vidyāyā atyantamevānapekṣāśramakarmamāmutāsti kācidapekṣeti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3477: tatrāta evāgnīndhanādīnyāśramakarmāṇi vidyā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣyanta evamatyantamevānapekṣāyāṃ prāptāyāmidamucyate sarvāpekṣā ceti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3479: nanu viruddhamidaṃ vacanamapekṣate cāśramakarmāṇi vidyā nāpekṣate ceti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3481: utpannā hi vidyā phalasiddhiṃ prati na kiñcidanyadapekṣata utpattiṃ prati tvapekṣate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3483: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssbh3u:3486: 'atha yadyajña ityācakṣate brahmacaryasya yajñādibhiḥ yaṃstavādyajñādīnāmapi hi sādhanabhāvaḥ sūcyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3487: 'sarve vedā yatpadamāmananti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yadvadanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3488: yadicchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tatte padaṃ saṃgraheṇa bravīmi' (kaṭha. 2.15)
GSP33brssbh3u:3490: smṛtirapi - 'kaṣāyapakatiḥ karmāṇi jñānaṃ tu paramā gatiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3491: kaṣāye karmabhiḥ pakke tato jñānaṃ pravartate' ityevamādyā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3493: yathāca yogyatāvaśenāśvo na lāṅgalākarṣaṇe yujyate rathacaryāyāṃ tu yujyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3494: evamāśramakarmāṇi vidyayā phalasiddhau nāpekṣyanta utpattau cāpekṣyanta iti // 26 //
GSP33brssbh3u:3496: śamadamādyupetas syāt tathāpi tu tadvidhes tadaṅgatayā teṣām apy avaśyānuṣṭheyatvāt / BBs_3,4.27 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3497: yadikaścinmanyeta yajñādīnāṃ vidyāsādhanabhāvo na nyāyyo vidhyabāvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3498: 'yajñena vividiṣanti' ityevañjātīyakā hi śrutiranuvādasvarūpāvidyābhiṣṭavaparā na yajñādividhiparā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3499: itthaṃ mahābhāgā vidyā syādvidyārthī 'tasmādevaṃvicchanto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvātmaneyevātmānaṃ paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.23)
GSP33brssbh3u:3501: nanvatrāpi śamādyupeto bhūtvā paśyatīti vartamānāpadeśa upalabhyate na vidhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3509: nahyayaṃ yajñādīnāṃ vividiṣāsaṃyogaḥ pūrvaṃ prāpto yenānūdyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:3510: 'tasmātpūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgo 'dantako hi ityevamādiṣu cāśrutavidhikeṣvapi vākyeṣvapūrvatvādvidhiṃ parikalpya pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau pratīyetyādivicāraḥ prathame tantre pravartitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3512: smṛtirapi bhagavadgītādyāsvanabhisaṃdhāya phalamanutiṣṭhitāni yajñādīni mumukṣorjñānasādhanāni bhavantīti prapañcitam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3513: tasmādyajñādīni śamadamādīni ca yathāśramaṃ sarvāṇyevāśramakarmāṇi vidyotpattāvapekṣitavyāni /
GSP33brssbh3u:3518: sarvān nānumatiś ca prāṇātyaye taddarśanāt / BBs_3,4.28 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3519: prāṇasaṃvāde śrūyate chandogānām - 'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati' (chā. 5.2.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3520: tathā vājasaneyinām - 'na ha vā asyānnaṃ jagdhaṃ bhavati nānannaṃ pratigṛhītam' (bṛ. 6.1.14) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3522: kimidaṃ sarvānnānujñānaṃ śamādivadvidyāṅgaṃ vidhīyata uta stutyarthaṃ saṃkārtyata iti saṃśaye vidhiriti tāvatprātm /
GSP33brssbh3u:3523: tathāhi - pravṛttiviśeṣakara upadeśo bhavatyataḥ prāṇavidyāsaṃnidhānāttadaṅgatveneyaṃ niyamanivṛttirupadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3529: ityanena vāmadevyāvidyāviṣayeṇa sarvastrayaparihāravacanena tatsāmānyaviṣayaṃ gamyāgamyavibhāgaśāstraṃ bādhyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3531: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nedaṃ sarvānnānujñānaṃ vidhīyata iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3532: nahyatra vidhāyakaḥ śabda upalabhyate 'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati' (chā. 5.2.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:3535: apica śvādimaryādaṃ prāṇasyānnamityuktvedamucyate 'naivaṃvidaḥ kiñcidanannaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3540: etaduktaṃ bhavati- prāṇātyaya eva hi parasyāmāpadi sarvamannamadīyatvenābhyanujñāyate taddarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3541: tathāhi śrutiścākrāyaṇasyerṣeḥ kaṣṭāyāmavasthāyāmabhakṣyabhakṣaṇe pravṛttiṃ darśayati - 'maṭacīhateṣu kuruṣu' (chā. 1.10.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:3548: tadetaducchiṣṭaparyuṣitabhakṣaṇaṃ darśayantyāḥ śruterāśayātiśayo lakṣyate prāṇātyayaprasaṅge prāṇasaṃdhāraṇāyābhakṣyamapi bhakṣayitavyamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3558: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3566: śabdaścānannasya pratiṣedhakaḥ kāmakāranivṛttiprayojanaḥ kāṭhakānāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ śrūyate - 'tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ surāṃ na pibet' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3575: idānīṃ tu kimamumukṣorapyaśramamātraniṣṭhasya vidyāmakāmamayamānasya tānyanuṣṭheyānyutāho neti cintyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3577: ityādināśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyāsādhanatvena vihitatvādvidyāmanicchataḥ phalāntaraṃ kāmayamānasya nityanyananuṣṭheyāni /
GSP33brssbh3u:3578: atha tasyāpyanuṣṭheyāni na tarhyeṣāṃ vidyāsādhanatvaṃ nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:3579: asyāṃ prāptau paṭhati - 'āśramamātraniṣṭhasyāpyamumukṣoḥ kartavyanyeva nityāni karmāṇi yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhoti' ityādinā vihitatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3581: atha yaduktaṃ naivaṃ sati vidyāsādhanatveṣāṃ syādityata uttaraṃ paṭhati -
GSP33brssbh3u:3584: vidyāsahakārīṇi caitāni syurvihitatvādeva 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti' (bṛ. 4.4.22) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3589: vidhilakṣaṇaṃ hi sādhanaṃ darśapūrṇamāsādi svargaphalasiṣādhayiṣayā sahakārisādhanāntaramapekṣate naivaṃ vidyā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3594: nitye hyekaḥ saṃyogo yāvajjīvādivākyakalpito na tasya vidyāphalatvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3597: yathaikasyāpi khādiratvasya nityena saṃyogena kratvarthatvamanityena saṃyogena puruṣārthatvaṃ tadvat // 33 //
GSP33brssbh3u:3600: sarvathāpyāśramakarmapakṣe vidyāsahakāritvapakṣe ca ta evāgnihotrādayo dharmā anuṣṭoyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3603: yathā kuṇḍapāyināmayane 'māsamagnihotraṃ jihoti' ityatra nityādagnihotrātkarmāntaramupadiśyate naivamiha karmabhedo 'stītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3607: iti siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuṅ kte natu juhvatītyādivadapūrvameṣāṃ rūpamutpādayatīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3608: smṛtiliṅgamapi 'anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ' (6.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:3610: yasyaite 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśatsaṃskārā ityādyā ca saṃskāratvaprasiddhirvaidikeṣu karmasu tatsaṃskṛtasya vidyotpattimabhipretya smṛtau bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3614_1: rāgadibhiḥ kleśaiḥ 'eṣa hyātmā na naśyati yaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate' (chā. 8.5.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3615: tasmādyajñādīnyāśramakarmāṇi ca bhavanti vidyāsahakārīṇi ceti niścitam // 35 //
GSP33brssbh3u:3619: vidhurādīnāṃ dravyādisaṃpadrahitānāṃ cānyatamāśramapratipattihīnānāmantarālavartināṃ kiṃ vidyāyāmadhikāro 'sti kiṃvā nāstīti saṃśaye nāstīti tāvatprāptam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3621: evaṃ prāpta idamāha - antarā cāpi tvanāśramitvena vartamāno 'pi vidyāyāmadhikriyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3627: nanu liṅgamidaṃ śrutismṛtidarśanamipanyastaṃ kā nu khalu prāptiriti sābhidhīyate -
GSP33brssbh3u:3631: tathāca smṛtiḥ - 'japyenaiva tu saṃsiddhyedbrāhmaṇo nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3632: kuryādantra vā kuryānmantro brāhmaṇa ucyate' ityasaṃbhavadāśramakarmāṇo 'pi japye 'dhikāraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3639: atas tv itarajjyāyo liṅgāc ca / BBs_3,4.39 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3644: saṃvatsaramanāśramī sthitvā kṛcchramekaṃ caret' iti ca smṛtiliṅgāt // 39 //
GSP33brssbh3u:3647: tadbhūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminer api niyamāt tadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ / BBs_3,4.40 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3649: tāṃstu prāptasya kathañcittataḥ pracyutirasti nāsti veti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3650: pūrvakarmasvanuṣṭhānacikīrṣayā vā rāgādivaśena vā pracyuto 'pi syādviśeṣābhāvāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:3651: evaṃ prāpta ucyate - tadbhūtasya tu pratipannordhvaretobhāvasya na kathañcidapyatadbhāvo na tataḥ pracyutiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3654: iti 'araṇyamiyāditi padaṃ tato na punareyādityupaniṣat' iti 'ācāryeṇābhyanujñātaścaturṇāmekamāśramam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3655: ā vimokṣāccharīrasya so 'nutiṣṭhedyathāvidi' iti caivañjātīyake niyamaḥ pracyutyaprabhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3660: yattu pūrvakarmasvanuṣṭhānacikīrṣayā pratyavarohaṇamiti tadasat 'śreyānsvadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmātsvanuṣṭhitāt' (3.35)
GSP33brssbh3u:3663: yo hi yaṃ prati vidhīyate sa tasya dharmo natu yo yena svanuṣṭhātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3670: na cādhikārikam api patanānumānāt tadayogāt / BBs_3,4.41 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3671: yadi naiṣṭhiko brahmacārī pramādādavakīryeta kiṃ tasya 'brahmacaryāvakīrṇī nairṛtaṃ gardabhamālabhet' ityetatprāyaścittaṃ syāduta neti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3675: kiṃ kāraṇam - 'ārūḍho naiṣṭhikaṃ dharmaṃ yastu pracyavate pinaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3676: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi yena śuddhyetsa ātmahā' ityapratisamādheyapatanasmaraṇācchinnaśirasa iva pratikriyānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3679: upapūrvam api tv eke bhāvamaśanavat tad uktam / BBs_3,4.42 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3681: yannaiṣṭhikasya gurudārādibhyo 'nyatra brahmacaryaṃ viśīryeta na tanmahāpātakaṃ bhavati gurutalpādiṣu mahāpātakeṣvaparigaṇanāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3685: ye hi prāyaścittasyābhāvamicchanti teṣāṃ na mūlamupalabhyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3686: ye tu bhāvamicchanti teṣāṃ brahmacāryavakīrṇetyadaviśeṣaśravaṇaṃ mūlam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3691_0: evaṃ bhikṣuvaikhānasayorapi vānaprastho dīkṣābhede kṛcchraṃ dvādaśarātraṃ caritvā
GSP33brssbh3u:3694: bahis tūbhayathāpi smṛter ācārāc ca / BBs_3,4.43 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3695: yadūrdhvaretasāṃ svaśramebhyaḥ pracyavanaṃ mahāpātakaṃ yadi vopapātakamubhayathāpi śiṣṭhaiste bahirkartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3697: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi yena śudhyetsa ātmahā' iti 'ārūḍhapatitaṃ vipraṃ maṇḍalācca viniḥsṛtam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3698: udbaddhaṃ kṛmidaṣṭaṃ ca spṛṣṭvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret' iti caivamādinindātiśayasmṛtibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3708: phalaṃ hi śrūyate - 'varṣati hāsmai varṣayati ha ya etadevaṃ vidvānvṛṣṭau pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste' (chā. 2.3.2) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:3712: phalaṃ ca kartaryupāsanānāṃ śrūyate - 'varṣatyasmai ya upāste' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:3713: nanvṛtvijo 'pi phalaṃ dṛṣṭam 'ātmane vā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tamāgāyati' (bṛ. 1.3.28) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3716: tasmātsvāmina eva phalavatsūpāsaneṣu kartṛtvamityātreya ācāryo manyate // 44 //
GSP33brssbh3u:3718: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate / BBs_3,4.45 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3725: tathāca 'taṃ ha bako dālbhyo vidāñcakāra sa ha naimiśīyānāmudgātā babhūva (chā. 1.2.13)
GSP33brssbh3u:3732: yāṃ vai kāñcana yajña ṛtvija āśiṣamāśāsata iti yajamānāyaiva tāmāśāsata iti hovāceti tasmādu haivaṃvidudgātā brūyātkaṃ te kāmamāgāyāni (chā. 1.7.8 - 9) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3737: sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat / BBs_3,4.47 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3738: 'tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca monaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇaḥ' (bṛ. 3.5.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:3740: tatra saṃśayaḥ maunaṃ vidīyate na veti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3743: nahyatha munirityatra vidāyakā vibhaktirupalabhyate tasmādayamanuvādo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3746: apicāmaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇa ityatra tāvanna brāhmaṇatvaṃ vidhīyate prāgeva prāptatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3747: tasmādatha brāhmaṇa iti praśaṃsāvadastathaivātha munirityapi bhavitumarhati samānanirdeṣatvāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:3756: nanu muniśabda uttamāśramavacano 'pi śrūyate 'gārhasthyamācāryakulaṃ maunaṃ vānaprastham' ityatra /
GSP33brssbh3u:3759: itarāśramasaṃnidhānāttu pāriśeṣyāttatrottamāśramopādānaṃ jñānapradhānatvādutmāśramasyaṣa tasmādbālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidīyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3760: yattu bālya eva vidheḥ paryavasānamiti tathāpyapūrvatvānmunitvasya vidheyatvāmāśrīyate muniḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:3764: tadadhikārāt 'ātmānaṃ viditvā putrādyeṣaṇābhyo vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3765: nanu sati vidyāvattve prāpnotyeva tatrātiśayaḥ kiṃ monavidhinetyata āha - pakṣeṇeti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3769: yathā - 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta' ityevañjātīyake vidhyādau sahakāritvenāgnyanbādhānādikamaṅgajātaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3771: evaṃ bālyādiviśiṣṭe kaivalyāśrame śrutimati vidyamāne kasmācchāndogye gṛhiṇopasaṃhāraḥ 'abhisamāvṛtya kuṭumbe' (chā. 8.15.1) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh3u:3778: bahulāyāsāni hi bahūnyāśramakarmāṇi yajñādīni taṃ prati kartavyatayopadiṣṭānyāśramāntarakarmāṇi ca yathāsaṃbhavamahiṃsendriyasaṃyamādīni tasya vidyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:3782: yathā maunaṃ gārhasthyaṃ caitāvāśramau śrutimantāvevamitarāvapi vānaprasthagurukulavāsau /
GSP33brssbh3u:3783: darśitā hi purastācchrutiḥ- 'tapaḥ eva dvitīyo brahmacaryācāryakulavāsī tṛtīyaḥ' (chā. 2.23.1) ityādyā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3791_0: tatra bālasya bhāvaḥ karma vā bālyamitiraddhite sati bālabhāvasya vayoviśeṣasyecchāyā
GSP33brssbh3u:3792: kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ kāmacāravādabhakṣaṇatā yathopapādamūtrapurīṣatvaṃ ca prasiddhataraṃ loke bālyamiti tadgrahaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3799: aviruddhe hyanyasminbālyaśabdābhilapye labhyamāne na vidhyantaravyāghātakalpanā yuktā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3808: tathācoktaṃ smṛtikāraiḥ - 'yaṃ na santaṃ na cāsantaṃ nāśrutaṃ na bahuśrutam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3809: na suvṛttaṃ na durvṛttaṃ veda kaścitsa brāhmaṇaḥ //
GSP33brssbh3u:3818: tatphalaṃ vidyā siddhyantī kimihaiva janmani siddhyatyuta kadācidamutrāpīti cnavtyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3823: naca kaścidamutra me vidyā jāyatāmityabhisaṃdhāya śravaṇādiṣu pravartate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3824: samāna eva tu janmani vidyājanmābhisaṃdhāyaiteṣu pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3827: evaṃ prāpte vadāmaḥ - aihikaṃ vidyājanma bhavatyasati prastutapratibandha iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3828: etadapaktaṃ bhavati - yadā prakrāntasya vidyāsādhanasya kaścitpratibandho na kriyata upasthitavipākena karmāntareṇa tadehaiva vidyotpadyate,
GSP33brssbh3u:3829: yadā tu khalu tatpratibandhaḥ kriyate tadāmutreti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3831: yāni cākasya karmaṇo vipācakāni deśakālanimittāni tānyevānyasyāpīti na niyantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3833: śāstramapyasya karmaṇa idaṃ phalaṃ bhavatītyetāvati paryavasitaṃ na deśakālanimittaviśeṣamapi saṃkārtayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3835: nacāviśeṣeṇa vidyāyāmabhisaṃdhirnotpadyata ihāmutra vā me vidyā jāyatāmityabhisaṃdherniraṅ kuśatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3837: tathācaśrutirdurbodhatvamātmano darśayati - 'śravaṇāyāpi bahubhiryo na labhyaḥ śṛṇvanto 'pi bahavo yaṃ na vidyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3838: āścaryo 'sya vaktā kuśalo 'sya labdhāścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ' (ka. 2.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3839: garbhasya eva ca vāmadevaḥ pratipede brahmabhāvamiti vadantī janmāntarasaṃcitātsādhanājjanmāntare vidyotpattiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3841: samṛtāvapi - 'aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati' (gī. 6.36)
GSP33brssbh3u:3842: ityarjunena pṛṣṭo bhagavānvāsudevaḥ 'nahi kalyāṇakṛtkaściddurgatiṃ tāta gacchati' (gī. 6.40)
GSP33brssbh3u:3843: ityuktvā punastasya puṇyalokaprāptiṃ sādhukule saṃbūtiṃ cābhidhāyānantaram 'tatra taṃ buddhisaṃyogaṃ labhate paurvadehikam' (gī.
GSP33brssbh3u:3850: yathā mumukṣorvidyāsādhanāvalambinaḥ sādhanavīryaviśeṣādvidyalakṣaṇe phala aihikāmuṣmikaphalatvakṛto viśeṣapratiniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3853: na khalu muktiphale kaścidevaṃbhūto viśeṣapratiniyama āśaṅkitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3865: apica vidyāsādhanaṃ svavīryaviśeṣāsvaphala eva vidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamāsañjayenna vidyāphale muktau /
GSP33brssbh3u:3867: naca tasyāmapyutkarṣanikarṣātmako 'tiśaya upapadyate nikṛṣṭāyā vidyātvābhāvādutkṛṣṭaiva hi vidyā bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3873: ityādyāsu guṇāvāpodvāpavaśādbhedopapattau satyāmupapadyate yathāsvaṃ phalabhedaniyamaḥ karmaphalavat /
GSP33brssbh3u:3874: tathāca liṅgadarśanam - 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3876: tathāca smṛtiḥ - 'nahi gatiradhikāsti kasyacitsati hi guṇe pravadantyatulyatām' iti /
